d02e761b-6d00-40b5-b9ec-40e35c584a9c.content:
Consider the following structures for a domain model of a software development company using SCRUM:
Entities.csv
```csv
ID,Name,SetName,Index,Description,Attribute0,Attribute1,Attribute2,Attribute3,Attribute4,Attribute5,Attribute6,Attribute7,Attribute8
E0,Project,P,p,The product or initiative to be developed,id,name,project_start,project_end,description,budget,status,target_audience,priority
E1,Team,T,t,"Self-organized, cross-functional development team",id,name,team_size,team_start,team_status,location,team_type,,
E2,Worker,W,w,Individual team member working on the project,id,name,first_name,email,start_date,status,availability,,
E3,Feature,F,f,Mid-sized functionality,id,title,description,status,priority,estimated_effort,,,
E4,Skill,S,s,Professional or social competence of a worker,id,label,description,level,certified,category,,,
E5,Role,R,r,Defined responsibilities within the Scrum team,id,role_name,description,area_of_responsibility,,,,,
E6,ProductOwner,PO,po,Responsible for product vision and Product Backlog,id,name,email,availability,,,,,
E7,ScrumMaster,SM,sm,Supports the team in applying Scrum,id,name,email,experience,,,,,
E8,ProductBacklog,PB,pb,Ordered list of all requirements,id,created_on,last_updated,number_of_entries,status,,,,
E9,Sprint,SP,sp,Fixed time period for creating an increment,id,sprint_number,start_date,end_date,status,achievement_of_goal,,,
E10,SprintPlanning,SPP,spp,Kick-off meeting for Sprint preparation,id,date,duration_(min),moderation,outcome_documentation,,,,
E11,DailyScrum,DS,ds,Daily 15-minute team meeting,id,date,time,duration,moderation,,,,
E12,SprintReview,SR,sr,Presentation and acceptance of results,id,date,duration,feedback_documentation,attendees_count,,,,
E13,SprintRetrospective,SRE,sre,Retrospective for process improvement,id,date,duration,improvement_actions,team_satisfaction,moderation,,,
E14,SprintBacklog,SBL,sbl,Selected backlog items + implementation plan,id,number_of_tasks,last_updated,status,total_effort,,,,
E15,SprintGoal,SG,sg,Objective to be achieved within the sprint,id,objective_description,achievement_status,benefit,,,,,
E16,Epic,E,e,Large requirement that can be split into stories,id,title,description,priority,status,estimated_effort,,,
E17,UserStory,US,us,Requirement from the perspective of a user,id,title,description,acceptance_criteria,priority,story_points,status,,
E18,Task,TSK,tsk,Smallest unit of work within a sprint,id,title,description,status,effort,type,,,
E19,DevelopmentSnapshot,DEV,dev,Product at the end of a sprint,id,version_number,creation_date,test_status,deployment_target,documentation,,,
E20,Blocker,BL,bl,Obstacle hindering progress,id,title,description,severity,status,detected_on,resolved_on,,
E21,Stakeholder,SH,sh,Interested party in the product (internal/external),id,name,organization,role,email,area_of_interest,influence_level,relevance_to_feature,
E22,Velocity,VEL,vel,Average amount of work per sprint,id,number_of_sprints_used,avg._story_points,max_velocity,min_velocity,trend,,,
E23,ReleasePlan,REP,rep,Plan for releasing specific features,id,version,planned_date,included_features,status,,,,
E24,Roadmap,RM,rm,Long-term planning across releases,id,start_date,end_date,milestones,objectives,versions,,,
E25,ScrumBoard,SCB,scb,Visual representation of tasks during the sprint,id,board_type,columns_(todo/done...),number_of_cards,last_updated,,,,
E26,FeatureDocumentation,FED,fed,Documentation for a specific feature,id,title,description,creation_date,change_log,linked_requirements,author,,
```
Relationships.csv
```csv
ID,Name,Description,FromEntity,ToEntity,FromCardinality,ToCardinality,Weight
R1,is_assigned_to_project,The team is assigned to a project,Team,Project,1,N,1.0
R2,belongs_to_team,An employee is assigned to a team,Employee,Team,N,1,1.0
R3,has_skill,An employee has certain skills,Employee,Skill,N,M,1.0
R4,takes_on_role,An employee assumes a role in the team,Employee,Role,N,M,1.0
R5,manages_backlog,The Product Owner manages the Product Backlog,ProductOwner,ProductBacklog,1,1,1.0
R6,is_supported_by,The team is supported by a Scrum Master,Team,ScrumMaster,1,1,1.0
R7,contains_feature,A Product Backlog contains Features,ProductBacklog,Feature,1,N,1.0
R8,contains_epic,A Product Backlog contains Epics,ProductBacklog,Epic,1,N,1.0
R9,contains_user_story,An Epic contains multiple User Stories,Epic,UserStory,1,N,1.0
R10,consists_of_tasks,A User Story consists of multiple Tasks,UserStory,Task,1,N,1.0
R11,is_in_sprint_backlog,A User Story is assigned to a Sprint Backlog,UserStory,SprintBacklog,N,M,1.0
R12,belongs_to_sprint,A Sprint Backlog belongs to a Sprint,SprintBacklog,Sprint,1,1,1.0
R13,pursues_goal,A Sprint pursues a defined goal,Sprint,SprintGoal,1,1,1.0
R14,contains_tasks,A Scrum Board contains all tasks of a Sprint,ScrumBoard,Task,1,N,1.0
R15,documents_feature,Feature Documentation belongs to a Feature,FeatureDocumentation,Feature,1,1,1.0
R16,is_blocked_by,A Task can be blocked by a Blocker,Task,Blocker,N,M,1.0
R17,participates_in,Stakeholders participate in a Sprint Review,Stakeholder,Sprint Review,N,M,1.0
R18,moderates_retrospective,A Scrum Master moderates the Retrospective,ScrumMaster,SprintRetrospective,1,N,1.0
R19,refers_to_team,Velocity refers to a specific Team,Velocity,Team,1,1,1.0
R20,plans_release,A Release Plan includes multiple Features,ReleasePlan,Feature,1,N,1.0
R21,is_part_of_roadmap,A Release Plan is part of a Roadmap,ReleasePlan,Roadmap,N,1,1.0
R22,generates_snapshot,A Sprint generates a Development Snapshot,Sprint,DevelopmentSnapshot,1,1,1.0
```
Based on Entities.csv and Relationships.csv - Proceed and Create 3 individual CSV code-blocks (alternative: files) in chat named: Goals.csv + Conditions.csv + DecisionVariables.csv
Goals.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
Conditions.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
DecisionVariables.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,DataType,Domain,MinValue,MaxValue"

The following conventions must be applied:
ID starts with a letter G(oals), C(onditions), D(ecision)V(ariables) and a number follows, starting at 0, 1, 2, ....
Name is written snake_case
Names for Goals must begin with "maximize_" or "minimize_"
IsSum is a boolean { True, False }
GoalType is one of { "min", "max" }
EntityName is always only 1 entry from the "Name" of Entities.csv
EntityAttribute is one of the values in the "Attribute0" to "Attribute8" of the targeted Entity in Entities.csv
CriteriaType is a number { 2 = Must-Match, 1 = May-Match, 0 = Cannot-Match }
Domain can represent set of values like "{0,1}"
MinValue is the smallest value that can be set
MaxValue is the highest value that can be set
Weight is a mulptlier
Created 10 to 15 entries in each of these files.

Use ALL of the previously provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) and formulate the optimization model mathematically and logically. 
Write it into a code-block for a LaTeX (.tex) file and provide the generated Latex code in chat.
The file consists of a introduction page with Title, Author, Date and Table of Contents.
The actual file contest consists of 5 different \sections labeled "1. Sets (Entities)", "2. Indices", "3. Goals", "4. Conditions", "5. DecisionVariables"
The items of each category are itemized between \begin and \end.
Goals and Conditions show both their IDs, Names and the logical and mathematical representation

Transform all of the provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Attributes, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) into a graph using the Mermaid.js Live Editor graph TD syntax.
Connect...
- Entities with their Attributes and place the Attributes around the Entities they belong to. (can exist multiple times in the graph to make lines less short)
- Entities with their Relations
- Goals with the Entity/Attributes
- Conditions with the Entity/Attributes
- DecisionVariables with their relevant Entities

Colorize...
- Entities in blue
- Attributes in white
- Relations in orange
- Goals in green
- Conditions in red
- Decision Variables in purple

Provide all 5 code-blocks (files) in chat:
3 Comma-Seperated-Values (csv), 1 LaTeX (tex), 1 Mermaid (mmd)

content_list.content:
Here is the complete optimization model generation based on your domain model (Entities, Relationships) and the required outputs:

---

### âœ… **1. Goals.csv**

```csv
ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight
G0,maximize_project_budget,Maximize total project budget,True,max,Project,budget,2,1.0
G1,minimize_project_duration,Minimize the duration of projects,True,min,Project,project_end,2,0.9
G2,maximize_team_size,Maximize total team size across teams,True,max,Team,team_size,1,0.7
G3,minimize_worker_unavailability,Minimize number of unavailable workers,True,min,Worker,availability,0,1.2
G4,maximize_feature_priority,Maximize sum of high-priority features,True,max,Feature,priority,2,1.1
G5,minimize_effort_per_sprint,Minimize total estimated effort per sprint,True,min,SprintBacklog,total_effort,2,1.0
G6,maximize_sprint_achievement,Maximize average sprint goal achievement,True,max,Sprint,achievement_of_goal,2,1.3
G7,minimize_blocker_severity,Minimize total severity of active blockers,True,min,Blocker,severity,2,1.4
G8,maximize_story_points_completed,Maximize completed story points per sprint,True,max,UserStory,story_points,2,1.1
G9,minimize_task_effort,Minimize total effort of all tasks,True,min,Task,effort,2,0.8
G10,maximize_stakeholder_influence,Maximize influence level of involved stakeholders,True,max,Stakeholder,influence_level,1,0.6
G11,minimize_release_delay,Minimize time between planned and actual release,True,min,ReleasePlan,planned_date,2,1.2
G12,maximize_velocity_trend,Maximize positive velocity trend,True,max,Velocity,trend,2,1.0
G13,minimize_daily_scrum_duration,Minimize total time spent in daily scrums,True,min,DailyScrum,duration,2,0.5
```

---

### âœ… **2. Conditions.csv**

```csv
ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight
C0,require_project_status,Project must be active,False,min,Project,status,2,1.0
C1,require_team_status,Team must be active,False,min,Team,team_status,2,1.0
C2,require_worker_status,Worker must be active,False,min,Worker,status,2,1.0
C3,require_feature_status,Feature must be in progress or done,False,min,Feature,status,2,1.0
C4,require_sprint_status,Sprint must be completed or in progress,False,min,Sprint,status,2,1.0
C5,require_task_status,Task must not be blocked,False,min,Task,status,0,1.0
C6,require_blocker_resolved,Blockers must be resolved,False,min,Blocker,resolved_on,1,0.8
C7,require_user_story_priority,User stories must have high priority,False,min,UserStory,priority,2,0.9
C8,require_skill_certified,Required skills must be certified,False,min,Skill,certified,2,1.1
C9,require_role_assignment,Each worker must have a Scrum role,False,min,Role,role_name,2,1.0
C10,require_sprint_goal_defined,Sprint must have a defined goal,False,min,SprintGoal,objective_description,2,1.0
C11,require_velocity_calculated,Velocity must be based on at least 3 sprints,False,min,Velocity,number_of_sprints_used,2,0.7
C12,require_release_status,Releases must be planned or released,False,min,ReleasePlan,status,2,0.8
C13,require_documentation_linked,Features must have linked documentation,False,min,FeatureDocumentation,linked_requirements,2,0.6
```

---

### âœ… **3. DecisionVariables.csv**

```csv
ID,Name,Description,DataType,Domain,MinValue,MaxValue
DV0,assign_worker_to_team,Binary assignment of worker to team,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV1,select_feature_for_backlog,Binary selection of feature for Product Backlog,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV2,include_user_story_in_sprint,Binary inclusion of user story in Sprint Backlog,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV3,plan_sprint_duration,Planned duration of sprint in days,real,,"1","30"
DV4,allocate_effort_to_task,Assigned effort to a task in hours,real,"0","160"
DV5,schedule_daily_scrum,Number of daily scrum meetings per sprint,integer,,"5","25"
DV6,set_story_points,Estimated story points for a user story,real,"1","21"
DV7,define_sprint_goal_achievement,Binary indicator of sprint goal achievement,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV8,activate_blocker,Indicates if a blocker is currently active,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV9,update_velocity_trend,Change in velocity trend from previous sprint,real,"-5","+5"
DV10,release_version_number,Version number for release plan,real,"1.0","10.0"
DV11,moderate_retrospective_count,Number of retrospectives moderated by Scrum Master,integer,"0","100"
DV12,document_feature_status,Status of feature documentation completeness,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV13,deploy_snapshot_target,Target environment for deployment (0=dev,1=prod),integer,"{0,1}",0,1
```

---

### âœ… **4. LaTeX (.tex) â€“ Optimization Model Document**

```latex
\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{titlesec}

\geometry{a4paper, margin=1in}
\title{SCRUM-Based Software Development Optimization Model}
\author{Optimization Team}
\date{\today}
\titleformat{\section}{\large\bfseries}{}{0em}{}

\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents
\newpage

\section{1. Sets (Entities)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Project: The product or initiative to be developed.
    \item Team: Self-organized, cross-functional development team.
    \item Worker: Individual team member working on the project.
    \item Feature: Mid-sized functionality.
    \item Skill: Professional or social competence of a worker.
    \item Role: Defined responsibilities within the Scrum team.
    \item ProductOwner: Responsible for product vision and Product Backlog.
    \item ScrumMaster: Supports the team in applying Scrum.
    \item ProductBacklog: Ordered list of all requirements.
    \item Sprint: Fixed time period for creating an increment.
    \item SprintPlanning: Kick-off meeting for Sprint preparation.
    \item DailyScrum: Daily 15-minute team meeting.
    \item SprintReview: Presentation and acceptance of results.
    \item SprintRetrospective: Retrospective for process improvement.
    \item SprintBacklog: Selected backlog items + implementation plan.
    \item SprintGoal: Objective to be achieved within the sprint.
    \item Epic: Large requirement that can be split into stories.
    \item UserStory: Requirement from the perspective of a user.
    \item Task: Smallest unit of work within a sprint.
    \item DevelopmentSnapshot: Product at the end of a sprint.
    \item Blocker: Obstacle hindering progress.
    \item Stakeholder: Interested party in the product (internal/external).
    \item Velocity: Average amount of work per sprint.
    \item ReleasePlan: Plan for releasing specific features.
    \item Roadmap: Long-term planning across releases.
    \item ScrumBoard: Visual representation of tasks during the sprint.
    \item FeatureDocumentation: Documentation for a specific feature.
\end{itemize}

\section{2. Indices}
\begin{itemize}
    \item $p \in P$: Index over Projects.
    \item $t \in T$: Index over Teams.
    \item $w \in W$: Index over Workers.
    \item $f \in F$: Index over Features.
    \item $s \in S$: Index over Skills.
    \item $r \in R$: Index over Roles.
    \item $sp \in SP$: Index over Sprints.
    \item $u \in US$: Index over User Stories.
    \item $tk \in TSK$: Index over Tasks.
    \item $bl \in BL$: Index over Blockers.
    \item $sh \in SH$: Index over Stakeholders.
    \item $v \in VEL$: Index over Velocity records.
    \item $rp \in REP$: Index over Release Plans.
\end{itemize}

\section{3. Goals}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[G0] \texttt{maximize\_project\_budget}: 
    $\max \sum_{p \in P} \text{budget}_p$ \quad (Weight: 1.0)
    
    \item[G1] \texttt{minimize\_project\_duration}: 
    $\min \sum_{p \in P} (\text{project\_end}_p - \text{project\_start}_p)$ \quad (Weight: 0.9)
    
    \item[G2] \texttt{maximize\_team\_size}: 
    $\max \sum_{t \in T} \text{team\_size}_t$ \quad (Weight: 0.7)
    
    \item[G3] \texttt{minimize\_worker\_unavailability}: 
    $\min \sum_{w \in W} \mathbb{I}(\text{availability}_w = \text{false})$ \quad (Weight: 1.2)
    
    \item[G4] \texttt{maximize\_feature\_priority}: 
    $\max \sum_{f \in F} \text{priority}_f \cdot x_f$, where $x_f = 1$ if feature selected \quad (Weight: 1.1)
    
    \item[G5] \texttt{minimize\_effort\_per\_sprint}: 
    $\min \sum_{sp \in SP} \text{total\_effort}_{sp}$ \quad (Weight: 1.0)
    
    \item[G6] \texttt{maximize\_sprint\_achievement}: 
    $\max \frac{1}{|SP|} \sum_{sp \in SP} \text{achievement\_of\_goal}_{sp}$ \quad (Weight: 1.3)
    
    \item[G7] \texttt{minimize\_blocker\_severity}: 
    $\min \sum_{bl \in BL} \text{severity}_{bl} \cdot (1 - z_{bl})$, $z_{bl}=1$ if resolved \quad (Weight: 1.4)
    
    \item[G8] \texttt{maximize\_story\_points\_completed}: 
    $\max \sum_{u \in US} \text{story\_points}_u \cdot y_u$, $y_u=1$ if completed \quad (Weight: 1.1)
    
    \item[G9] \texttt{minimize\_task\_effort}: 
    $\min \sum_{tk \in TSK} \text{effort}_{tk}$ \quad (Weight: 0.8)
    
    \item[G10] \texttt{maximize\_stakeholder\_influence}: 
    $\max \sum_{sh \in SH} \text{influence\_level}_{sh}$ \quad (Weight: 0.6)
    
    \item[G11] \texttt{minimize\_release\_delay}: 
    $\min \sum_{rp \in REP} |\text{actual\_date}_{rp} - \text{planned\_date}_{rp}|$ \quad (Weight: 1.2)
    
    \item[G12] \texttt{maximize\_velocity\_trend}: 
    $\max \sum_{v \in VEL} \text{trend}_v$ \quad (Weight: 1.0)
    
    \item[G13] \texttt{minimize\_daily\_scrum\_duration}: 
    $\min \sum_{sp \in SP} \text{duration}_{ds} \cdot n_{sp}$, $n_{sp}$ = days in sprint \quad (Weight: 0.5)
\end{itemize}

\section{4. Conditions}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[C0] \texttt{require\_project\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_p = \text{"active"} \quad \forall p \in P$
    
    \item[C1] \texttt{require\_team\_status}: 
    $\text{team\_status}_t = \text{"active"} \quad \forall t \in T$
    
    \item[C2] \texttt{require\_worker\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_w = \text{"active"} \quad \forall w \in W$
    
    \item[C3] \texttt{require\_feature\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_f \in \{\text{"in progress"}, \text{"done"}\} \quad \forall f \in F$
    
    \item[C4] \texttt{require\_sprint\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_{sp} \in \{\text{"completed"}, \text{"in progress"}\} \quad \forall sp \in SP$
    
    \item[C5] \texttt{require\_task\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_{tk} \neq \text{"blocked"} \quad \forall tk \in TSK$
    
    \item[C6] \texttt{require\_blocker\_resolved}: 
    $\text{resolved\_on}_{bl} \leq \text{current\_date} \quad \forall bl \in BL$
    
    \item[C7] \texttt{require\_user\_story\_priority}: 
    $\text{priority}_u \geq 5 \quad \forall u \in US$
    
    \item[C8] \texttt{require\_skill\_certified}: 
    $\text{certified}_s = \text{true} \quad \forall s \in S$
    
    \item[C9] \texttt{require\_role\_assignment}: 
    Each worker has at least one role: $\sum_{r \in R} r_{w,r} \geq 1 \quad \forall w \in W$
    
    \item[C10] \texttt{require\_sprint\_goal\_defined}: 
    $\text{objective\_description}_{sp} \neq \emptyset \quad \forall sp \in SP$
    
    \item[C11] \texttt{require\_velocity\_calculated}: 
    $\text{number\_of\_sprints\_used}_v \geq 3 \quad \forall v \in VEL$
    
    \item[C12] \texttt{require\_release\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_{rp} \in \{\text{"planned"}, \text{"released"}\} \quad \forall rp \in REP$
    
    \item[C13] \texttt{require\_documentation\_linked}: 
    $\text{linked\_requirements}_{fd} \neq \emptyset \quad \forall fd \in FED$
\end{itemize}

\section{5. DecisionVariables}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[DV0] \texttt{assign\_worker\_to\_team}: $x_{w,t} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV1] \texttt{select\_feature\_for\_backlog}: $f_f \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV2] \texttt{include\_user\_story\_in\_sprint}: $y_{u,sp} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV3] \texttt{plan\_sprint\_duration}: $d_{sp} \in [1, 30]$
    \item[DV4] \texttt{allocate\_effort\_to\_task}: $e_{tk} \in [0, 160]$
    \item[DV5] \texttt{schedule\_daily\_scrum}: $n_{sp} \in \mathbb{Z}^+, 5 \leq n_{sp} \leq 25$
    \item[DV6] \texttt{set\_story\_points}: $sp_u \in [1, 21]$
    \item[DV7] \texttt{define\_sprint\_goal\_achievement}: $a_{sp} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV8] \texttt{activate\_blocker}: $b_{bl} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV9] \texttt{update\_velocity\_trend}: $\Delta v \in [-5, +5]$
    \item[DV10] \texttt{release\_version\_number}: $v_{rp} \in [1.0, 10.0]$
    \item[DV11] \texttt{moderate\_retrospective\_count}: $m_{sm} \in \mathbb{Z}^+, 0 \leq m_{sm} \leq 100$
    \item[DV12] \texttt{document\_feature\_status}: $d_f \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV13] \texttt{deploy\_snapshot\_target}: $env_{dev} \in \{0,1\}$
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
```

---

### âœ… **5. Mermaid.js Graph (mmd)**

```mmd
graph TD
    %% Entities (Blue)
    Project[Project]:::entity
    Team[Team]:::entity
    Worker[Worker]:::entity
    Feature[Feature]:::entity
    Skill[Skill]:::entity
    Role[Role]:::entity
    ProductOwner[ProductOwner]:::entity
    ScrumMaster[ScrumMaster]:::entity
    ProductBacklog[ProductBacklog]:::entity
    Sprint[Sprint]:::entity
    SprintPlanning[SprintPlanning]:::entity
    DailyScrum[DailyScrum]:::entity
    SprintReview[SprintReview]:::entity
    SprintRetrospective[SprintRetrospective]:::entity
    SprintBacklog[SprintBacklog]:::entity
    SprintGoal[SprintGoal]:::entity
    Epic[Epic]:::entity
    UserStory[UserStory]:::entity
    Task[Task]:::entity
    DevelopmentSnapshot[DevelopmentSnapshot]:::entity
    Blocker[Blocker]:::entity
    Stakeholder[Stakeholder]:::entity
    Velocity[Velocity]:::entity
    ReleasePlan[ReleasePlan]:::entity
    Roadmap[Roadmap]:::entity
    ScrumBoard[ScrumBoard]:::entity
    FeatureDocumentation[FeatureDocumentation]:::entity

    %% Attributes (White)
    Project -- id --> A1[id]:::attribute
    Project -- name --> A2[name]:::attribute
    Project -- budget --> A3[budget]:::attribute
    Project -- status --> A4[status]:::attribute
    Project -- project_start --> A5[project_start]:::attribute
    Project -- project_end --> A6[project_end]:::attribute

    Team -- id --> B1[id]:::attribute
    Team -- team_size --> B2[team_size]:::attribute
    Team -- team_status --> B3[team_status]:::attribute

    Worker -- id --> C1[id]:::attribute
    Worker -- name --> C2[name]:::attribute
    Worker -- availability --> C3[availability]:::attribute
    Worker -- status --> C4[status]:::attribute

    Feature -- id --> D1[id]:::attribute
    Feature -- title --> D2[title]:::attribute
    Feature -- priority --> D3[priority]:::attribute
    Feature -- status --> D4[status]:::attribute

    Skill -- id --> E1[id]:::attribute
    Skill -- certified --> E2[certified]:::attribute

    Sprint -- id --> F1[id]:::attribute
    Sprint -- achievement_of_goal --> F2[achievement_of_goal]:::attribute
    Sprint -- status --> F3[status]:::attribute

    SprintBacklog -- total_effort --> G1[total_effort]:::attribute

    Blocker -- severity --> H1[severity]:::attribute
    Blocker -- resolved_on --> H2[resolved_on]:::attribute

    UserStory -- story_points --> I1[story_points]:::attribute

    Task -- effort --> J1[effort]:::attribute

    Stakeholder -- influence_level --> K1[influence_level]:::attribute

    Velocity -- trend --> L1[trend]:::attribute
    Velocity -- number_of_sprints_used --> L2[number_of_sprints_used]:::attribute

    ReleasePlan -- planned_date --> M1[planned_date]:::attribute
    ReleasePlan -- status --> M2[status]:::attribute

    DailyScrum -- duration --> N1[duration]:::attribute

    FeatureDocumentation -- linked_requirements --> O1[linked_requirements]:::attribute

    %% Relationships (Orange)
    R1[is_assigned_to_project]:::relation --> Project
    R1 --> Team

    R2[belongs_to_team]:::relation --> Worker
    R2 --> Team

    R3[has_skill]:::relation --> Worker
    R3 --> Skill

    R4[takes_on_role]:::relation --> Worker
    R4 --> Role

    R5[manages_backlog]:::relation --> ProductOwner
    R5 --> ProductBacklog

    R6[is_supported_by]:::relation --> Team
    R6 --> ScrumMaster

    R7[contains_feature]:::relation --> ProductBacklog
    R7 --> Feature

    R9[contains_user_story]:::relation --> Epic
    R9 --> UserStory

    R10[consists_of_tasks]:::relation --> UserStory
    R10 --> Task

    R12[belongs_to_sprint]:::relation --> SprintBacklog
    R12 --> Sprint

    R16[is_blocked_by]:::relation --> Task
    R16 --> Blocker

    R17[participates_in]:::relation --> Stakeholder
    R17 --> SprintReview

    R19[refers_to_team]:::relation --> Velocity
    R19 --> Team

    R20[plans_release]:::relation --> ReleasePlan
    R20 --> Feature

    R22[generates_snapshot]:::relation --> Sprint
    R22 --> DevelopmentSnapshot

    %% Goals (Green)
    G0[maximize_project_budget]:::goal --> A3
    G1[minimize_project_duration]:::goal --> A6
    G2[maximize_team_size]:::goal --> B2
    G3[minimize_worker_unavailability]:::goal --> C3
    G4[maximize_feature_priority]:::goal --> D3
    G5[minimize_effort_per_sprint]:::goal --> G1
    G6[maximize_sprint_achievement]:::goal --> F2
    G7[minimize_blocker_severity]:::goal --> H1
    G8[maximize_story_points_completed]:::goal --> I1
    G9[minimize_task_effort]:::goal --> J1
    G10[maximize_stakeholder_influence]:::goal --> K1
    G11[minimize_release_delay]:::goal --> M1
    G12[maximize_velocity_trend]:::goal --> L1
    G13[minimize_daily_scrum_duration]:::goal --> N1

    %% Conditions (Red)
    C0[require_project_status]:::condition --> A4
    C1[require_team_status]:::condition --> B3
    C2[require_worker_status]:::condition --> C4
    C3[require_feature_status]:::condition --> D4
    C4[require_sprint_status]:::condition --> F3
    C5[require_task_status]:::condition --> J1
    C6[require_blocker_resolved]:::condition --> H2
    C7[require_user_story_priority]:::condition --> I1
    C8[require_skill_certified]:::condition --> E2
    C9[require_role_assignment]:::condition --> Role
    C10[require_sprint_goal_defined]:::condition --> SprintGoal
    C11[require_velocity_calculated]:::condition --> L2
    C12[require_release_status]:::condition --> M2
    C13[require_documentation_linked]:::condition --> O1

    %% Decision Variables (Purple)
    DV0[assign_worker_to_team]:::decision --> Worker
    DV1[select_feature_for_backlog]:::decision --> Feature
    DV2[include_user_story_in_sprint]:::decision --> UserStory
    DV3[plan_sprint_duration]:::decision --> Sprint
    DV4[allocate_effort_to_task]:::decision --> Task
    DV5[schedule_daily_scrum]:::decision --> DailyScrum
    DV6[set_story_points]:::decision --> UserStory
    DV7[define_sprint_goal_achievement]:::decision --> Sprint
    DV8[activate_blocker]:::decision --> Blocker
    DV9[update_velocity_trend]:::decision --> Velocity
    DV10[release_version_number]:::decision --> ReleasePlan
    DV11[moderate_retrospective_count]:::decision --> SprintRetrospective
    DV12[document_feature_status]:::decision --> FeatureDocumentation
    DV13[deploy_snapshot_target]:::decision --> DevelopmentSnapshot

    %% Styling
    classDef entity fill:#1f77b4,stroke:#005580,color:white,font-weight:bold;
    classDef attribute fill:#ffffff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px,color:black;
    classDef relation fill:#ff8c00,stroke:#cc6600,color:white,font-size:12px;
    classDef goal fill:#2ca02c,stroke:#1e7e1e,color:white,font-size:12px;
    classDef condition fill:#d62728,stroke:#a01c1c,color:white,font-size:12px;
    classDef decision fill:#9467bd,stroke:#6a4a8c,color:white,font-size:12px;

    class Project,Team,Worker,Feature,Skill,Role,ProductOwner,ScrumMaster,ProductBacklog,Sprint,SprintPlanning,DailyScrum,SprintReview,SprintRetrospective,SprintBacklog,SprintGoal,Epic,UserStory,Task,DevelopmentSnapshot,Blocker,Stakeholder,Velocity,ReleasePlan,Roadmap,ScrumBoard,FeatureDocumentation entity
    class A1,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,B1,B2,B3,C1,C2,C3,C4,D1,D2,D3,D4,E1,E2,F1,F2,F3,G1,H1,H2,I1,J1,K1,L1,L2,M1,M2,N1,O1 attribute
    class R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6,R7,R9,R10,R12,R16,R17,R19,R20,R22 relation
    class G0,G1,G2,G3,G4,G5,G6,G7,G8,G9,G10,G11,G12,G13 goal
    class C0,C1,C2,C3,C4,C5,C6,C7,C8,C9,C10,C11,C12,C13 condition
    class DV0,DV1,DV2,DV3,DV4,DV5,DV6,DV7,DV8,DV9,DV10,DV11,DV12,DV13 decision
```

---

### âœ… Summary

You now have:

1. **Goals.csv** â€“ 14 strategic optimization goals.
2. **Conditions.csv** â€“ 14 hard/soft constraints.
3. **DecisionVariables.csv** â€“ 14 decision variables with domains.
4. **LaTeX (.tex)** â€“ Full optimization model document with sections and math.
5. **Mermaid (.mmd)** â€“ Visual graph integrating entities, attributes, relationships, goals, conditions, and decisions with color coding.

You can paste the Mermaid code into [Mermaid Live Editor](https://mermaid.live/edit) to visualize the full domain model graph.

Let me know if you'd like this exported as downloadable files or extended with objective function aggregation!

messages.content:
Consider the following structures for a domain model of a software development company using SCRUM:
Entities.csv
```csv
ID,Name,SetName,Index,Description,Attribute0,Attribute1,Attribute2,Attribute3,Attribute4,Attribute5,Attribute6,Attribute7,Attribute8
E0,Project,P,p,The product or initiative to be developed,id,name,project_start,project_end,description,budget,status,target_audience,priority
E1,Team,T,t,"Self-organized, cross-functional development team",id,name,team_size,team_start,team_status,location,team_type,,
E2,Worker,W,w,Individual team member working on the project,id,name,first_name,email,start_date,status,availability,,
E3,Feature,F,f,Mid-sized functionality,id,title,description,status,priority,estimated_effort,,,
E4,Skill,S,s,Professional or social competence of a worker,id,label,description,level,certified,category,,,
E5,Role,R,r,Defined responsibilities within the Scrum team,id,role_name,description,area_of_responsibility,,,,,
E6,ProductOwner,PO,po,Responsible for product vision and Product Backlog,id,name,email,availability,,,,,
E7,ScrumMaster,SM,sm,Supports the team in applying Scrum,id,name,email,experience,,,,,
E8,ProductBacklog,PB,pb,Ordered list of all requirements,id,created_on,last_updated,number_of_entries,status,,,,
E9,Sprint,SP,sp,Fixed time period for creating an increment,id,sprint_number,start_date,end_date,status,achievement_of_goal,,,
E10,SprintPlanning,SPP,spp,Kick-off meeting for Sprint preparation,id,date,duration_(min),moderation,outcome_documentation,,,,
E11,DailyScrum,DS,ds,Daily 15-minute team meeting,id,date,time,duration,moderation,,,,
E12,SprintReview,SR,sr,Presentation and acceptance of results,id,date,duration,feedback_documentation,attendees_count,,,,
E13,SprintRetrospective,SRE,sre,Retrospective for process improvement,id,date,duration,improvement_actions,team_satisfaction,moderation,,,
E14,SprintBacklog,SBL,sbl,Selected backlog items + implementation plan,id,number_of_tasks,last_updated,status,total_effort,,,,
E15,SprintGoal,SG,sg,Objective to be achieved within the sprint,id,objective_description,achievement_status,benefit,,,,,
E16,Epic,E,e,Large requirement that can be split into stories,id,title,description,priority,status,estimated_effort,,,
E17,UserStory,US,us,Requirement from the perspective of a user,id,title,description,acceptance_criteria,priority,story_points,status,,
E18,Task,TSK,tsk,Smallest unit of work within a sprint,id,title,description,status,effort,type,,,
E19,DevelopmentSnapshot,DEV,dev,Product at the end of a sprint,id,version_number,creation_date,test_status,deployment_target,documentation,,,
E20,Blocker,BL,bl,Obstacle hindering progress,id,title,description,severity,status,detected_on,resolved_on,,
E21,Stakeholder,SH,sh,Interested party in the product (internal/external),id,name,organization,role,email,area_of_interest,influence_level,relevance_to_feature,
E22,Velocity,VEL,vel,Average amount of work per sprint,id,number_of_sprints_used,avg._story_points,max_velocity,min_velocity,trend,,,
E23,ReleasePlan,REP,rep,Plan for releasing specific features,id,version,planned_date,included_features,status,,,,
E24,Roadmap,RM,rm,Long-term planning across releases,id,start_date,end_date,milestones,objectives,versions,,,
E25,ScrumBoard,SCB,scb,Visual representation of tasks during the sprint,id,board_type,columns_(todo/done...),number_of_cards,last_updated,,,,
E26,FeatureDocumentation,FED,fed,Documentation for a specific feature,id,title,description,creation_date,change_log,linked_requirements,author,,
```
Relationships.csv
```csv
ID,Name,Description,FromEntity,ToEntity,FromCardinality,ToCardinality,Weight
R1,is_assigned_to_project,The team is assigned to a project,Team,Project,1,N,1.0
R2,belongs_to_team,An employee is assigned to a team,Employee,Team,N,1,1.0
R3,has_skill,An employee has certain skills,Employee,Skill,N,M,1.0
R4,takes_on_role,An employee assumes a role in the team,Employee,Role,N,M,1.0
R5,manages_backlog,The Product Owner manages the Product Backlog,ProductOwner,ProductBacklog,1,1,1.0
R6,is_supported_by,The team is supported by a Scrum Master,Team,ScrumMaster,1,1,1.0
R7,contains_feature,A Product Backlog contains Features,ProductBacklog,Feature,1,N,1.0
R8,contains_epic,A Product Backlog contains Epics,ProductBacklog,Epic,1,N,1.0
R9,contains_user_story,An Epic contains multiple User Stories,Epic,UserStory,1,N,1.0
R10,consists_of_tasks,A User Story consists of multiple Tasks,UserStory,Task,1,N,1.0
R11,is_in_sprint_backlog,A User Story is assigned to a Sprint Backlog,UserStory,SprintBacklog,N,M,1.0
R12,belongs_to_sprint,A Sprint Backlog belongs to a Sprint,SprintBacklog,Sprint,1,1,1.0
R13,pursues_goal,A Sprint pursues a defined goal,Sprint,SprintGoal,1,1,1.0
R14,contains_tasks,A Scrum Board contains all tasks of a Sprint,ScrumBoard,Task,1,N,1.0
R15,documents_feature,Feature Documentation belongs to a Feature,FeatureDocumentation,Feature,1,1,1.0
R16,is_blocked_by,A Task can be blocked by a Blocker,Task,Blocker,N,M,1.0
R17,participates_in,Stakeholders participate in a Sprint Review,Stakeholder,Sprint Review,N,M,1.0
R18,moderates_retrospective,A Scrum Master moderates the Retrospective,ScrumMaster,SprintRetrospective,1,N,1.0
R19,refers_to_team,Velocity refers to a specific Team,Velocity,Team,1,1,1.0
R20,plans_release,A Release Plan includes multiple Features,ReleasePlan,Feature,1,N,1.0
R21,is_part_of_roadmap,A Release Plan is part of a Roadmap,ReleasePlan,Roadmap,N,1,1.0
R22,generates_snapshot,A Sprint generates a Development Snapshot,Sprint,DevelopmentSnapshot,1,1,1.0
```
Based on Entities.csv and Relationships.csv - Proceed and Create 3 individual CSV code-blocks (alternative: files) in chat named: Goals.csv + Conditions.csv + DecisionVariables.csv
Goals.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
Conditions.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
DecisionVariables.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,DataType,Domain,MinValue,MaxValue"

The following conventions must be applied:
ID starts with a letter G(oals), C(onditions), D(ecision)V(ariables) and a number follows, starting at 0, 1, 2, ....
Name is written snake_case
Names for Goals must begin with "maximize_" or "minimize_"
IsSum is a boolean { True, False }
GoalType is one of { "min", "max" }
EntityName is always only 1 entry from the "Name" of Entities.csv
EntityAttribute is one of the values in the "Attribute0" to "Attribute8" of the targeted Entity in Entities.csv
CriteriaType is a number { 2 = Must-Match, 1 = May-Match, 0 = Cannot-Match }
Domain can represent set of values like "{0,1}"
MinValue is the smallest value that can be set
MaxValue is the highest value that can be set
Weight is a mulptlier
Created 10 to 15 entries in each of these files.

Use ALL of the previously provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) and formulate the optimization model mathematically and logically. 
Write it into a code-block for a LaTeX (.tex) file and provide the generated Latex code in chat.
The file consists of a introduction page with Title, Author, Date and Table of Contents.
The actual file contest consists of 5 different \sections labeled "1. Sets (Entities)", "2. Indices", "3. Goals", "4. Conditions", "5. DecisionVariables"
The items of each category are itemized between \begin and \end.
Goals and Conditions show both their IDs, Names and the logical and mathematical representation

Transform all of the provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Attributes, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) into a graph using the Mermaid.js Live Editor graph TD syntax.
Connect...
- Entities with their Attributes and place the Attributes around the Entities they belong to. (can exist multiple times in the graph to make lines less short)
- Entities with their Relations
- Goals with the Entity/Attributes
- Conditions with the Entity/Attributes
- DecisionVariables with their relevant Entities

Colorize...
- Entities in blue
- Attributes in white
- Relations in orange
- Goals in green
- Conditions in red
- Decision Variables in purple

Provide all 5 code-blocks (files) in chat:
3 Comma-Seperated-Values (csv), 1 LaTeX (tex), 1 Mermaid (mmd)

content_list.content:
Here is the complete optimization model generation based on your domain model (Entities, Relationships) and the required outputs:

---

### âœ… **1. Goals.csv**

```csv
ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight
G0,maximize_project_budget,Maximize total project budget,True,max,Project,budget,2,1.0
G1,minimize_project_duration,Minimize the duration of projects,True,min,Project,project_end,2,0.9
G2,maximize_team_size,Maximize total team size across teams,True,max,Team,team_size,1,0.7
G3,minimize_worker_unavailability,Minimize number of unavailable workers,True,min,Worker,availability,0,1.2
G4,maximize_feature_priority,Maximize sum of high-priority features,True,max,Feature,priority,2,1.1
G5,minimize_effort_per_sprint,Minimize total estimated effort per sprint,True,min,SprintBacklog,total_effort,2,1.0
G6,maximize_sprint_achievement,Maximize average sprint goal achievement,True,max,Sprint,achievement_of_goal,2,1.3
G7,minimize_blocker_severity,Minimize total severity of active blockers,True,min,Blocker,severity,2,1.4
G8,maximize_story_points_completed,Maximize completed story points per sprint,True,max,UserStory,story_points,2,1.1
G9,minimize_task_effort,Minimize total effort of all tasks,True,min,Task,effort,2,0.8
G10,maximize_stakeholder_influence,Maximize influence level of involved stakeholders,True,max,Stakeholder,influence_level,1,0.6
G11,minimize_release_delay,Minimize time between planned and actual release,True,min,ReleasePlan,planned_date,2,1.2
G12,maximize_velocity_trend,Maximize positive velocity trend,True,max,Velocity,trend,2,1.0
G13,minimize_daily_scrum_duration,Minimize total time spent in daily scrums,True,min,DailyScrum,duration,2,0.5
```

---

### âœ… **2. Conditions.csv**

```csv
ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight
C0,require_project_status,Project must be active,False,min,Project,status,2,1.0
C1,require_team_status,Team must be active,False,min,Team,team_status,2,1.0
C2,require_worker_status,Worker must be active,False,min,Worker,status,2,1.0
C3,require_feature_status,Feature must be in progress or done,False,min,Feature,status,2,1.0
C4,require_sprint_status,Sprint must be completed or in progress,False,min,Sprint,status,2,1.0
C5,require_task_status,Task must not be blocked,False,min,Task,status,0,1.0
C6,require_blocker_resolved,Blockers must be resolved,False,min,Blocker,resolved_on,1,0.8
C7,require_user_story_priority,User stories must have high priority,False,min,UserStory,priority,2,0.9
C8,require_skill_certified,Required skills must be certified,False,min,Skill,certified,2,1.1
C9,require_role_assignment,Each worker must have a Scrum role,False,min,Role,role_name,2,1.0
C10,require_sprint_goal_defined,Sprint must have a defined goal,False,min,SprintGoal,objective_description,2,1.0
C11,require_velocity_calculated,Velocity must be based on at least 3 sprints,False,min,Velocity,number_of_sprints_used,2,0.7
C12,require_release_status,Releases must be planned or released,False,min,ReleasePlan,status,2,0.8
C13,require_documentation_linked,Features must have linked documentation,False,min,FeatureDocumentation,linked_requirements,2,0.6
```

---

### âœ… **3. DecisionVariables.csv**

```csv
ID,Name,Description,DataType,Domain,MinValue,MaxValue
DV0,assign_worker_to_team,Binary assignment of worker to team,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV1,select_feature_for_backlog,Binary selection of feature for Product Backlog,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV2,include_user_story_in_sprint,Binary inclusion of user story in Sprint Backlog,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV3,plan_sprint_duration,Planned duration of sprint in days,real,,"1","30"
DV4,allocate_effort_to_task,Assigned effort to a task in hours,real,"0","160"
DV5,schedule_daily_scrum,Number of daily scrum meetings per sprint,integer,,"5","25"
DV6,set_story_points,Estimated story points for a user story,real,"1","21"
DV7,define_sprint_goal_achievement,Binary indicator of sprint goal achievement,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV8,activate_blocker,Indicates if a blocker is currently active,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV9,update_velocity_trend,Change in velocity trend from previous sprint,real,"-5","+5"
DV10,release_version_number,Version number for release plan,real,"1.0","10.0"
DV11,moderate_retrospective_count,Number of retrospectives moderated by Scrum Master,integer,"0","100"
DV12,document_feature_status,Status of feature documentation completeness,integer,"{0,1}",0,1
DV13,deploy_snapshot_target,Target environment for deployment (0=dev,1=prod),integer,"{0,1}",0,1
```

---

### âœ… **4. LaTeX (.tex) â€“ Optimization Model Document**

```latex
\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{titlesec}

\geometry{a4paper, margin=1in}
\title{SCRUM-Based Software Development Optimization Model}
\author{Optimization Team}
\date{\today}
\titleformat{\section}{\large\bfseries}{}{0em}{}

\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents
\newpage

\section{1. Sets (Entities)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Project: The product or initiative to be developed.
    \item Team: Self-organized, cross-functional development team.
    \item Worker: Individual team member working on the project.
    \item Feature: Mid-sized functionality.
    \item Skill: Professional or social competence of a worker.
    \item Role: Defined responsibilities within the Scrum team.
    \item ProductOwner: Responsible for product vision and Product Backlog.
    \item ScrumMaster: Supports the team in applying Scrum.
    \item ProductBacklog: Ordered list of all requirements.
    \item Sprint: Fixed time period for creating an increment.
    \item SprintPlanning: Kick-off meeting for Sprint preparation.
    \item DailyScrum: Daily 15-minute team meeting.
    \item SprintReview: Presentation and acceptance of results.
    \item SprintRetrospective: Retrospective for process improvement.
    \item SprintBacklog: Selected backlog items + implementation plan.
    \item SprintGoal: Objective to be achieved within the sprint.
    \item Epic: Large requirement that can be split into stories.
    \item UserStory: Requirement from the perspective of a user.
    \item Task: Smallest unit of work within a sprint.
    \item DevelopmentSnapshot: Product at the end of a sprint.
    \item Blocker: Obstacle hindering progress.
    \item Stakeholder: Interested party in the product (internal/external).
    \item Velocity: Average amount of work per sprint.
    \item ReleasePlan: Plan for releasing specific features.
    \item Roadmap: Long-term planning across releases.
    \item ScrumBoard: Visual representation of tasks during the sprint.
    \item FeatureDocumentation: Documentation for a specific feature.
\end{itemize}

\section{2. Indices}
\begin{itemize}
    \item $p \in P$: Index over Projects.
    \item $t \in T$: Index over Teams.
    \item $w \in W$: Index over Workers.
    \item $f \in F$: Index over Features.
    \item $s \in S$: Index over Skills.
    \item $r \in R$: Index over Roles.
    \item $sp \in SP$: Index over Sprints.
    \item $u \in US$: Index over User Stories.
    \item $tk \in TSK$: Index over Tasks.
    \item $bl \in BL$: Index over Blockers.
    \item $sh \in SH$: Index over Stakeholders.
    \item $v \in VEL$: Index over Velocity records.
    \item $rp \in REP$: Index over Release Plans.
\end{itemize}

\section{3. Goals}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[G0] \texttt{maximize\_project\_budget}: 
    $\max \sum_{p \in P} \text{budget}_p$ \quad (Weight: 1.0)
    
    \item[G1] \texttt{minimize\_project\_duration}: 
    $\min \sum_{p \in P} (\text{project\_end}_p - \text{project\_start}_p)$ \quad (Weight: 0.9)
    
    \item[G2] \texttt{maximize\_team\_size}: 
    $\max \sum_{t \in T} \text{team\_size}_t$ \quad (Weight: 0.7)
    
    \item[G3] \texttt{minimize\_worker\_unavailability}: 
    $\min \sum_{w \in W} \mathbb{I}(\text{availability}_w = \text{false})$ \quad (Weight: 1.2)
    
    \item[G4] \texttt{maximize\_feature\_priority}: 
    $\max \sum_{f \in F} \text{priority}_f \cdot x_f$, where $x_f = 1$ if feature selected \quad (Weight: 1.1)
    
    \item[G5] \texttt{minimize\_effort\_per\_sprint}: 
    $\min \sum_{sp \in SP} \text{total\_effort}_{sp}$ \quad (Weight: 1.0)
    
    \item[G6] \texttt{maximize\_sprint\_achievement}: 
    $\max \frac{1}{|SP|} \sum_{sp \in SP} \text{achievement\_of\_goal}_{sp}$ \quad (Weight: 1.3)
    
    \item[G7] \texttt{minimize\_blocker\_severity}: 
    $\min \sum_{bl \in BL} \text{severity}_{bl} \cdot (1 - z_{bl})$, $z_{bl}=1$ if resolved \quad (Weight: 1.4)
    
    \item[G8] \texttt{maximize\_story\_points\_completed}: 
    $\max \sum_{u \in US} \text{story\_points}_u \cdot y_u$, $y_u=1$ if completed \quad (Weight: 1.1)
    
    \item[G9] \texttt{minimize\_task\_effort}: 
    $\min \sum_{tk \in TSK} \text{effort}_{tk}$ \quad (Weight: 0.8)
    
    \item[G10] \texttt{maximize\_stakeholder\_influence}: 
    $\max \sum_{sh \in SH} \text{influence\_level}_{sh}$ \quad (Weight: 0.6)
    
    \item[G11] \texttt{minimize\_release\_delay}: 
    $\min \sum_{rp \in REP} |\text{actual\_date}_{rp} - \text{planned\_date}_{rp}|$ \quad (Weight: 1.2)
    
    \item[G12] \texttt{maximize\_velocity\_trend}: 
    $\max \sum_{v \in VEL} \text{trend}_v$ \quad (Weight: 1.0)
    
    \item[G13] \texttt{minimize\_daily\_scrum\_duration}: 
    $\min \sum_{sp \in SP} \text{duration}_{ds} \cdot n_{sp}$, $n_{sp}$ = days in sprint \quad (Weight: 0.5)
\end{itemize}

\section{4. Conditions}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[C0] \texttt{require\_project\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_p = \text{"active"} \quad \forall p \in P$
    
    \item[C1] \texttt{require\_team\_status}: 
    $\text{team\_status}_t = \text{"active"} \quad \forall t \in T$
    
    \item[C2] \texttt{require\_worker\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_w = \text{"active"} \quad \forall w \in W$
    
    \item[C3] \texttt{require\_feature\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_f \in \{\text{"in progress"}, \text{"done"}\} \quad \forall f \in F$
    
    \item[C4] \texttt{require\_sprint\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_{sp} \in \{\text{"completed"}, \text{"in progress"}\} \quad \forall sp \in SP$
    
    \item[C5] \texttt{require\_task\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_{tk} \neq \text{"blocked"} \quad \forall tk \in TSK$
    
    \item[C6] \texttt{require\_blocker\_resolved}: 
    $\text{resolved\_on}_{bl} \leq \text{current\_date} \quad \forall bl \in BL$
    
    \item[C7] \texttt{require\_user\_story\_priority}: 
    $\text{priority}_u \geq 5 \quad \forall u \in US$
    
    \item[C8] \texttt{require\_skill\_certified}: 
    $\text{certified}_s = \text{true} \quad \forall s \in S$
    
    \item[C9] \texttt{require\_role\_assignment}: 
    Each worker has at least one role: $\sum_{r \in R} r_{w,r} \geq 1 \quad \forall w \in W$
    
    \item[C10] \texttt{require\_sprint\_goal\_defined}: 
    $\text{objective\_description}_{sp} \neq \emptyset \quad \forall sp \in SP$
    
    \item[C11] \texttt{require\_velocity\_calculated}: 
    $\text{number\_of\_sprints\_used}_v \geq 3 \quad \forall v \in VEL$
    
    \item[C12] \texttt{require\_release\_status}: 
    $\text{status}_{rp} \in \{\text{"planned"}, \text{"released"}\} \quad \forall rp \in REP$
    
    \item[C13] \texttt{require\_documentation\_linked}: 
    $\text{linked\_requirements}_{fd} \neq \emptyset \quad \forall fd \in FED$
\end{itemize}

\section{5. DecisionVariables}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[DV0] \texttt{assign\_worker\_to\_team}: $x_{w,t} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV1] \texttt{select\_feature\_for\_backlog}: $f_f \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV2] \texttt{include\_user\_story\_in\_sprint}: $y_{u,sp} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV3] \texttt{plan\_sprint\_duration}: $d_{sp} \in [1, 30]$
    \item[DV4] \texttt{allocate\_effort\_to\_task}: $e_{tk} \in [0, 160]$
    \item[DV5] \texttt{schedule\_daily\_scrum}: $n_{sp} \in \mathbb{Z}^+, 5 \leq n_{sp} \leq 25$
    \item[DV6] \texttt{set\_story\_points}: $sp_u \in [1, 21]$
    \item[DV7] \texttt{define\_sprint\_goal\_achievement}: $a_{sp} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV8] \texttt{activate\_blocker}: $b_{bl} \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV9] \texttt{update\_velocity\_trend}: $\Delta v \in [-5, +5]$
    \item[DV10] \texttt{release\_version\_number}: $v_{rp} \in [1.0, 10.0]$
    \item[DV11] \texttt{moderate\_retrospective\_count}: $m_{sm} \in \mathbb{Z}^+, 0 \leq m_{sm} \leq 100$
    \item[DV12] \texttt{document\_feature\_status}: $d_f \in \{0,1\}$
    \item[DV13] \texttt{deploy\_snapshot\_target}: $env_{dev} \in \{0,1\}$
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
```

graph TD

    Worker -- id --> C1[id]:::attribute

    Feature -- id --> D1[id]:::attribute

    Skill -- id --> E1[id]:::attribute

    Sprint -- id --> F1[id]:::attribute

    SprintBacklog -- total_effort --> G1[total_effort]:::attribute

    Blocker -- severity --> H1[severity]:::attribute
    Blocker -- resolved_on --> H2[resolved_on]:::attribute

    UserStory -- story_points --> I1[story_points]:::attribute

    Task -- effort --> J1[effort]:::attribute

    Stakeholder -- influence_level --> K1[influence_level]:::attribute

    Velocity -- trend --> L1[trend]:::attribute
    Velocity -- number_of_sprints_used --> L2[number_of_sprints_used]:::attribute

    ReleasePlan -- planned_date --> M1[planned_date]:::attribute
    ReleasePlan -- status --> M2[status]:::attribute

    DailyScrum -- duration --> N1[duration]:::attribute

    FeatureDocumentation -- linked_requirements --> O1[linked_requirements]:::attribute

    %% Relationships (Orange)
    R1[is_assigned_to_project]:::relation --> Project
    R1 --> Team

    R2[belongs_to_team]:::relation --> Worker
    R2 --> Team

    R3[has_skill]:::relation --> Worker
    R3 --> Skill

    R4[takes_on_role]:::relation --> Worker
    R4 --> Role

    R5[manages_backlog]:::relation --> ProductOwner
    R5 --> ProductBacklog

    R6[is_supported_by]:::relation --> Team
    R6 --> ScrumMaster

    R7[contains_feature]:::relation --> ProductBacklog
    R7 --> Feature

    R9[contains_user_story]:::relation --> Epic

    R10[consists_of_tasks]:::relation --> UserStory
    R10 --> Task

    R12[belongs_to_sprint]:::relation --> SprintBacklog
    R12 --> Sprint

    R16[is_blocked_by]:::relation --> Task
    R16 --> Blocker

    R17[participates_in]:::relation --> Stakeholder
    R17 --> SprintReview

    R19[refers_to_team]:::relation --> Velocity
    R19 --> Team

    R20[plans_release]:::relation --> ReleasePlan
    R20 --> Feature

    R22[generates_snapshot]:::relation --> Sprint
    R22 --> DevelopmentSnapshot

    %% Goals (Green)
    G0[maximize_project_budget]:::goal --> A3
    G1[minimize_project_duration]:::goal --> A6
    G2[maximize_team_size]:::goal --> B2
    G3[minimize_worker_unavailability]:::goal --> C3
    G4[maximize_feature_priority]:::goal --> D3
    G5[minimize_effort_per_sprint]:::goal --> G1
    G6[maximize_sprint_achievement]:::goal --> F2
    G7[minimize_blocker_severity]:::goal --> H1
    G8[maximize_story_points_completed]:::goal --> I1
    G9[minimize_task_effort]:::goal --> J1
    G10[maximize_stakeholder_influence]:::goal --> K1
    G11[minimize_release_delay]:::goal --> M1
    G12[maximize_velocity_trend]:::goal --> L1
    G13[minimize_daily_scrum_duration]:::goal --> N1

    %% Conditions (Red)
    C0[require_project_status]:::condition --> A4
    C1[require_team_status]:::condition --> B3
    C2[require_worker_status]:::condition --> C4
    C3[require_feature_status]:::condition --> D4
    C4[require_sprint_status]:::condition --> F3
    C5[require_task_status]:::condition --> J1
    C6[require_blocker_resolved]:::condition --> H2
    C7[require_user_story_priority]:::condition --> I1
    C8[require_skill_certified]:::condition --> E2
    C9[require_role_assignment]:::condition --> Role

    C12[require_release_status]:::condition --> M2
    C13[require_documentation_linked]:::condition --> O1

    %% Decision Variables (Purple)
    DV0[assign_worker_to_team]:::decision --> Worker
    DV1[select_feature_for_backlog]:::decision --> Feature
    DV2[include_user_story_in_sprint]:::decision --> UserStory
    DV3[plan_sprint_duration]:::decision --> Sprint

### âœ… Summary

You now have:

1. **Goals.csv** â€“ 14 strategic optimization goals.
2. **Conditions.csv** â€“ 14 hard/soft constraints.
3. **DecisionVariables.csv** â€“ 14 decision variables with domains.
4. **LaTeX (.tex)** â€“ Full optimization model document with sections and math.
5. **Mermaid (.mmd)** â€“ Visual graph integrating entities, attributes, relationships, goals, conditions, and decisions with color coding.

You can paste the Mermaid code into [Mermaid Live Editor](https://mermaid.live/edit) to visualize the full domain model graph.
